website_summaries.verdict: This magnetic drawing board has compact dimensions, built-in storage for stamps, and even comes with a carry bag, making it ideal on-the-go.
pros: Between 3 stamps and 1 pen there plenty of ways to get creative
Tethered pen and onboard stamp storage keep pieces from getting lost
Carry bag is a nice touch
cons: Stamps can be tricky for little fingers to get out of the peg holes

customer_reviews.title: My 2 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We have an upcoming trip that I specifically bought this for and my son loves it. It's small enough that it doesn't take up too much room and light enough for the carry-on. He loves the little stamps. I'm not sure how long this will hold up but as long as it makes it to and from Greece, I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Raptis

customer_reviews.title: Useful and fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this colorful board for my two years old daughter. She loves it! Well designed,good quality. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal popham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This is good size for little kid, and easy to carry with carry bag. Drawing picture with beautiful picture, it make creativity and come with three little cute stamp. My little kid very like it.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: First Time Parents YES!
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than others but is still toddler sized. If you are coming back for a second then don't get this one because it's too small for your (2+) toddler but for any kid younger it's perfect (first time parents, you will be getting a second one, accept it, this one is a great starter). My 2 year old is suffering through scribbling on a mommy-hand sized surface, compared to a daddy one and weirdly doesn't care! Anyway, I've spoken with friends and the general consensus is that kids use these until they break... so make this one your starter because it's great though just a little too small for 3 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this so much! Lightweight, small and easy to use and nice that you can keep erasing as my son loves to keep drawing on it. We are about to travel and this will definitely help him pass the time on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Allthethings

customer_reviews.title: great Customer service!
customer_reviews.text: ⭐️UPDATE⭐️ The seller contacted me, refunded me fully and sent a newly designed product. With the shapes sitting on top! Great customer service! I want to like this but there’s a glaring Design flaw in the way the shape magnets are stored. Then come out through the bottom which means they are easily lost. My 3 year old lost all of them the first time we gave it to her on a plane. The rest of it was good until it broke about 3 weeks in. The handle broke off the magnet so she can’t erase any more. She’s literally never broken a toy before (only ripped books) so this isn’t a case of my child is rough of toys
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Small and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The picture they have of the mother and son drawing on the board makes the board look bigger than it really is. Please remember that the drawing dimensions are 5.9inx4in, which is a pretty small space. I measured ahead of time so I knew what I was getting, but I wanted to bring it to someone’s attention, just in case they decide not to look at the dimensions. It’s perfect sized for traveling and very lightweight, but it does take a few swipes back and forth to clear the screen. All in all, for the price it is pretty decent. My child loves it, and that’s the important thing. She’s a tiny child and can easily lug it around.
customer_reviews.author: KLeeMagee

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 10 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had better reviews than most of the others I looked at, but I was really disappointed. It feels really flimsy, like it would break in no time and it stopped erasing after only a week and a half of play. If you hold it up to the light, there is something broken off the bar that you slide to erase and therefore, it won’t erase when you slide it. Every now and then, it will pick the broken piece back up and erase, but it’s very sporadic and my child gets frustrated with it. I don’t think it’s worth the $10 I paid and I will be sending it back due to it being unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Updated 1-30-2020: Poor Quality/great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: After my disappointed review the company reached out to make it better. They sent me another magnetic drawing board to try. It was a much much better quality but a completely different board. I am updating to say that they have wonderful customer service and I believe the other board might have been a fluke. Terrible quality. Writing hardly shows up, cheap plastic, the "screen" part sinks in when you write. Doesn't erase all the way. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kienholz

customer_reviews.title: I could appreciate it but .....
customer_reviews.text: What looked like a cute personal item at first, I realized is just as mass produced a product as anything else. You can buy a bigger (& honestly better quality) sketch board at Walmart for cheaper than this. The colors were a mix of brown, there was no real color difference. I had ordered two and both had issues, each different.
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: So Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter to drag around with her to our friends house and in the car. I was getting tired of her using her tablet all the time so I thought this was good alternative. She really likes it. It's super cute, very light, comes with a bag which is convenient. I actually think its really cool also because the sand in it is different colors. Never seen anything like that before. It also comes with some stamps which my kid really likes since she isn't exactly an expert at drawing or writing. Makes her feel like she is actually doodling something.
customer_reviews.author: IvoryDoom

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it but...
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month daughter absolutely loves this board. We haven’t had it but a few weeks and as much as she enjoyed it, I had to take it away from her. The pen keeps falling off of the string. The plastic has spit on it at the seems so it won’t stay on and I don’t want her to choke on it. Also, the white board keeps sliding out of the plastic itself. The quality definitely needs to be better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son enjoyed it while is lasted
customer_reviews.text: This item’s quality was not the best but my son loved it. The colored board is a novel concept, but unfortunately we are now starting to see darkness around the edges and his writing is not looking so clear so he does not try to use it anymore. It’s lasted about a month, which is a far cry from the 6+ months we had our other Magna Doodle. The stamps work OK, large for a small board. I would not buy this again at the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pre-K classroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my early childhood classroom, and it became so popular that I quickly bought a second one. It works well and the kids really enjoy seeing the different colors. They also have a lot of fun with the shapes, I do wish they were geometric shapes instead of the rabbit (or if there were different options). I love that the stylus is thin and rather short which promotes a more mature grasp.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEWWReceived replacement
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the manufacturer responded to my below review and immediately sent a replacement. The replacement was much better quality, so I’m going to assume the product I had received was damaged in transit or something. My children have been playing with it roughly for the last two weeks and it shows no signs of wear or tear. PREVIOUS REVIEW: The product broke within an hour of being opened. I watched my toddlers play with it and they weren’t being overly rough. All it took was one small fall and the magnet under the screen detached from the eraser, rendering the tablet useless as you can no longer erase anything.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay and Alison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Magnadoodles have been around forever and they continue to be a big hit with kids. This one is wonderful--it's big enough to allow a lot of drawing, plus the background is actually multicolored,not just gray like most of the others. I also like that the "pen" is attached with a string--otherwise those things disappear instantly. Overall, it's a great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Piper grace

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard for small children
customer_reviews.text: My son actually loves the product! He got it for Christmas and loved being able to doodle and erase. Sometimes you have to erase twice to get it truly clean again. The reason I gave 2 stars is for the poor design quality of a toy for a toddler. My son managed in about 2 weeks to separate the pencil from the point and had it in his mouth. I’m just glad I caught it before he swallowed it. So be VERY careful and supervise when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Shawtyred

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic pen top comes off
customer_reviews.text: We loved this little board when we received it. HOWEVER, the tip of the pen is easily pulled off by my toddler and infant and it becomes a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: jacksonfam4.0

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Updated: the supplier saw my review and reached out by sending a new drawing board that fixed some of the issues we saw in the first one. This is amazing customer service! Thank you and would order from this seller again. Ok quality but didnt spend a lot of money. The travel bag is awful. Cheap and design are contact instructions for the seller. Weird for a kid to have that on their bag. Wouldn't recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for a car ride
customer_reviews.text: For the money, hard to beat. Great for a long car trip. Pros: The pen is connected, meaning my 18mo can’t lose it. The magnets on the other hand.... It’s cute! The colors are fun. It’s a nice size for my kid now but I wish it was a bit bigger. Cons: It’s a little flimsy feeling and seems kinda cheaply made. you have to “wipe clean” the board probably 5-10 times before it’s really clean.
customer_reviews.author: H. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I was looking for something non messy that my toddler could use on her own. I take the magnetic shapes away when we aren't playing together to be safe, but she loves this. She will bring it to me and ask for letters all the time. I'll do a letter and picture of her choice and she will clear it. She likes to scribble on it to and she loves the shapes. Best purchase of the year for us.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sims

customer_reviews.title: Best toy for travel and at home
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy so much. My daughter is 16 months and she is very active this is a great way to engage with her drawing shapes and practicing the names of colors without making a mess. The bag it comes with is great to carry other items with as well and with it being neon green we never lose it. I highly recommend this for your child or for a child you may want to buy a gift for.
customer_reviews.author: Mellow Yellow

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fun for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: This drawing board is a great value! It works well and has given my son lots of fun. It has even survived being tossed around a whole bunch. I did take away the little stamps, as I was concerned about them being a choking hazard. Overall, I’m quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Toy Durability
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining toy for my 2 yr/old grand daughter, who seems to enjoy scribbling characters and shapes. However I do not expect this toy to function and last more than 3~4 months, considering the previous 2 units failed the same way within that time frame: The common failure mode is that the the erase handle become loose and does not erase the drawing board anymore. A 4 star rating, in my opinion, is well deserved.
customer_reviews.author: jum_mmix

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but the customer service goes above and beyond.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately- Terrible . Broke on the first day. Flimsy and poor quality. UPDATE - Received a refund immediately and a different product, same idea from the company. I realize that the product I ordered could/should be better quality, but the company is committed to providing above and beyond good customer experience. They did not need to issue a refund or provide a new product, but they did. It shows that they care about the offerings they have and stand behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Colorful board
customer_reviews.text: My 4 years old love it. It’s colorful and playful which occupied my little one for at least 30 minutes......feeling great to have a “quiet time” as a working mom. One downside is, the board is relatively small. I would like to purchase a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: CWFH

customer_reviews.title: Love the Handle!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the kiddos. I immediately 'lost' (on purpose) the little shapes that come with it so that we didn't have to fuss with trying to keep them with the board. The pen comes off the string sometimes, but I'm able to easily fix it when that happens. If I'd just add a little super-glue to the opening, I'm sure I'd never have to fix it again!
customer_reviews.author: ss80401

customer_reviews.title: Fun toddler toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 15 month old to get baby early on writing. The toy is very well packaged, even include a neon drawstring bag as a gift. One observation is that the board doesnt erase perfectly that I can see some trace reminence, but kiddo doesn't mind so we are all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mimimichili

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 16 month old granddaughter. She's just beginning to hold a crayon to scribble. I'm sure she will use this a lot. Will use at home and be taking it in the diaper bag when we go out too. I did take the magnetic shapes off until she's older. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pen tip broke off on second day but was able to fix
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because my toddler dropped it once and the pen tip broke off. I fixed it with Krazy glue and it seems to be holding up, but I’m a little concerned about the durability. Grandchild loves it, so I’m just really watching that the tip doesn’t come off again. It’s a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn O

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This was my original review: A $5 product TOPS. Cheap quality for price. (AND GAVE IT 3 STARS) Company replaced the product w a much better quality product. Loved that. IT SAYS A LOT ABOUT THE COMPANY. Way better now!
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Travel friendly
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves to color but eats crayons and try’s to color on the table or wall. This is wonderful and clean. It was small enough and very light to fit in our bag on the plane. She used it for 2 flights and in the car on our trip. ThAnk you for a travel friendly toy!
customer_reviews.author: Honeyofsonny

customer_reviews.title: Hard to erase.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my son, but he doesn’t like it yet at 18 months old. He just likes the magnets on it, but won’t play with the board. It’s also too hard for him to slide the eraser back and forth, and he is pretty strong. It should be easier to erase.
customer_reviews.author: lea everett

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a sweet two-year-old’s birthday, and MY two-year-old tested it out and loved it! Looks great for car rides - snug fitting place for magnet shapes to stay put and the product doesn’t look weird without those magnets if you chose to put them away for a child who might consider them a choking hazard. Also came with a sweet note from the seller - very considerate and kind!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for using in the car seat! My child is very fond of moving and crying in the car. Give him this toy. He can play alone and quietly for half an hour. This is a very good design and it is helpful to inspire the child's imagination. It's very durable and worth recommending to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Keeps my extremely active toddler entertained.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, amazing customer service. We are using this drawing board as part of my toddler’s speech and OT therapies. Needless to say, it gets the job done while also keeping him entertained. We weren’t expecting the different colors of the drawings and it was a nice surprise as we can also practice colors while we do his other activities. The pencil is the right size for his little hands (he is almost 2) and it is not heavy, so he can take it anywhere he wants. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just start off by saying that we absolutely love this! I love that it writes in colors instead of black/gray. I also love that it comes with stamps and that the stamps clip into it so you aren’t likely to lose them! My son enjoys it a lot. It’s a fun way to learn shapes and colors, as well as just doodle too! The possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: A must have on a rod trip!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things was the best investment for a long road trip I made! The kids mostly played with these. Absolutely loved them and ykept them busy. I have a 3 almost 4 year old and a 2 almost 3 year old. Seriously it’s worth the 11 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who like to draw
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes to draw a lot and on all kinds of surfaces in the house, including the walls of course. This magnetic drawing board significantly decreases the chances of wall doodles in the house and saves a lot of money on paper and crayons or color pencils. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: YH Wu

customer_reviews.title: My toddlers love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my toddlers who got a mini version and absolutely loved them and they absolutely love these as well as specially the fact that when they draw its rainbow colored. They came quickly and came with cute bags for them.
customer_reviews.author: tameika

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler travel toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 mo old loves this and can easily erase pictures, it doesn’t stick! This has relieved the frustration as she can use this independently. We already lost the magnets but she honestly didn’t use them much. It’s small and perfect for toddler ages!
customer_reviews.author: kschwalbCO

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.... carrying bag is not safe for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We really like the board itself and the magnets.... keeps our toddler busy and entertained... BUT... the carry bag that is included is dangerous for toddlers, the straps are too long and child can strangle him/herself. I would remove it from the package or would change the design of it on something more like a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Small but ok for price i guess
customer_reviews.text: It’s small so I guess it’s good traveling. Looking at the picture with that backpack. I would’ve imagined it to be bigger. It’s smaller than I wanted. So that’s a disappointment. Outside of that it’s work prefect I just wish I knew the size first.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Broke the same day my kids got it. They were not being rough. UPDATE..... they apologized for the defective product and gave me a full refund. Great customer service. So changing my review and giving more stars. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B. Salas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for traveling. It's cheap and my 4 year old likes it. My only complaint is that the magnets fall off of their little holes on the board, so we have already lost one (on a trip). We don't use the drawstring bag because the magnet board goes in our travel backpack.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a
customer_reviews.text: The color background is a nice change. The three magnetic shapes to draw with are fun and store easily in the frame. The magnetic drawing board came loose from the frame rather quickly- it’s still in place, but is loose and slides around a bit. Not a deal breaker, but shows that you get what you pay for. Doesn’t bother my 4 year old and for now doesn’t affect ability to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay H

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 2yr old on a whim for an extra Xmas gift because it was inexpensive and we figured we could use it for traveling. Mission accomplished. The size is perfect and the board provides hours of entertainment. We now use it for keeping our little one entertained in the car, when traveling, for boring places like restaurants, you name it. This thing has been a great addition to our "entertainment" bag.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N.

customer_reviews.title: Decent cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little toy for traveling. My 20 month old has fun drawing and erasing. Unfortunately, it is already (after two uses) showing signs of wear. There are grey streaks across the drawing surface that won't erase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: lifesaver on a long car trip
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item to our 4 year old grandson for a twelve hour road trip. We played tic tac toe, worked on writing words, and drew endless pictures. When I visited a month later, I was happy to find it was the one toy still in the car and looked as good as new. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Traveling friendly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, we keep it in the car and it’s been a lifesaver. It’s a little hard for little fingers to unhook the pen which can be a pro or a con. The string that the pen comes attached to is super flimsy and unraveled in the first day
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Fun drawing board for children
customer_reviews.text: Update: received another one and drawing board works great! My littles are very happy playing and drawing with it. Unfortunately my littles could only play with this for 3 days due to the magnetic strip broke and stopped clearing the screen
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: My 2yo nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for gifts, the kids loved them. I noticed that the colors are very muddy looking(like someone mixed dark gray with all of them) and there were some spots that didn't work. The kids didn't notice but I was kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn’t stay
customer_reviews.text: The color does not stay at all. My kid will draw but then it immediately fades. It’s honestly quite the POS
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Editing my review... the board did start to break after a month (screen moved and shifted and couldn’t erase well). I surprisingly receive a new and improved model that seems more Durable with a a sincere letter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler entertainment
customer_reviews.text: The board is great, particularly for travel! Bought it for my nephew to use in the car and he loves it. It's pretty big, easy to use, and can take a beating from toddler! Customer service is excellent and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 《DBLG》

customer_reviews.title: Good but flimsy board
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drawing board for toddlers, its colorful and easy to use . But the board itself is a bit flimsy, the white drawing pad has shifted a few times but I was able to put it back in place. Hasnt broken yet just need to be gentle with it which is hard with a toddler boy haha! But he enjoys the drawing pad and the stamps too. Overall for the price i am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. He's always writing on it. This drawing board is quite durable and has held up to my toddler hitting the surface with the writing pen. There are some translation errors on the box (see the picture I included) but those don't effect the use of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this
customer_reviews.text: This board is a little smaller than I was expecting but is great for keeping my 2 year old occupied while we're in the car. She seems to like the different colors on the board. There really isn't much else to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME COMPANY, EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. He used it daily to write his letter. After a few weeks, the tab to erase the screen broke. It could not be fixed, so we had to trash it. Finding another replacement quickly that is more durable. EXCELLENT UPDATE!!!...... The company sent me a replacement free of charge and reimbursed the money for the broken one. My son hasn't stopped playing with it for about 2 weeks and so far so good, I love it as well. Its a new model and it writes better also, LOVE IT!!!! THANKS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Salve

customer_reviews.title: Amazing service 5stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cute useful items for my kids but had small issue, the seller was so wonderful and blazingly fast to help me. My kids love these boards as they are essential when we are dining outside. Keeps them busy and learning. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Park

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel toy to keep in the car
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. Would like if the board was better so that spots that can’t be drawn on did not form. I leave in my car and the kids always enjoy playing with them. I always keep two so they each have one.
customer_reviews.author: TeeJae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old son LOVES this thing I did take away the shaped magnets for now since he still likes to put things in his mouth but otherwise awesome would def. buy again and recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute item and fun for our toddler. My only complaint is that it is not quite as sturdy as I would have liked. However, I really like the color variation throughout and our kiddo likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: LMH01

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: If Ava loves it mommy loves it! Lol and I love the fact that it’s smaller! So much easier for her to carry. Perfect for car rides and visiting people, or even just sitting at home! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Brittany laskowski

customer_reviews.title: Pay a couple extra bucks and get a name brand one
customer_reviews.text: The pencil felt apart within 3 days of arrival and that’s a big risk if you have smaller kids. They can easily swallow it and that’s not good. We had to dispose it to avoid issues, not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: lgiln

customer_reviews.title: Toddler likes it- that’s what’s important
customer_reviews.text: Toddler has enjoyed it- bought for plane ride - and it has stood up to some abuse so more sturdy than I expected - the one BIG disappointment is the so called backpack to carry it in- what a joke and the writing on it made it unusable
customer_reviews.author: K.D. McNeff

customer_reviews.title: Good travel toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddler during a recent roadtrip! Good size and the included travel bag was a bonus because the magnets would get lost otherwise. I liked that the writing surface has four different colors which made it more fun him to draw.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: A fun cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, worked as a fun diversion for a car trip. Cheaply made and not designed well. The little parts are not attached and are easy to lose, though they do fit into the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Polka Dot Pajamas

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this drawing board
customer_reviews.text: This drawing board is fantastic! I was pleasantly surprised it came with a carry bag and the drawing board has 3 attached shapes to use on the drawing board. Great as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: To entertain a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for airplane travel, but toddler still plays with it now. He asks to "draw". Cute little thing. Got rid of the pointless bag. Always afraid to lose the three shapes. Fun that each corner is a different color. When swiping clean, doesn't always come perfectly clean especially after lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: A little flinsy but works well. My daughter loves it. Stamps fell out and disappeared almost immediately although they’re too small to have around a toddler anyways. Color is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Awful toy
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap it is already messed up I had one years ago that I bought for my first grandbaby who is now 25 years old and he has lasted through 10 grandchildren this one is not sturdy enough there’s there’s just nothing I can say good about itIn order to write it I have to at least give you wants one star if there was anyway I could give you zero stars that is exactly what I would do
customer_reviews.author: Clara Bailey

customer_reviews.title: OK but smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. No issues. Its a lot smaller than I expected. Guess I should have read the measurements first. The picture was misleading Feel like I could've got one this size cheaper at the 5 below store 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: My two year old literally stole this from the counter right after I unboxed it so as far as I'm concerned, the one who's actually going to be using it has spoken
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Board comes with a very cute backpack and ours even had an extra pen! Customer service sent over email letting us know we can contact them if we need to replace any parts. Not the heaviest plastic, but nice and light for little ones to carry around. Very happy with this purchase for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Pen came detached/Company fixed issue
customer_reviews.text: Pen came detached and the string unraveled and we can no longer attach it back to the board. Now, the pen is lost due to not being able to attach back. Update: Company gave me a new and improved board
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: We have triplets so it’s great that each boy has his own separate toy.Would you please send us two more stylus (for the lack of a better name), we did already lose on and the other is just in case.😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite toy and is very durable. Easy to travel with for restaurants and the such. She uses it when playing in her room in the morning too which is great because it’s quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle

customer_reviews.title: The eraser works perfectly too!
customer_reviews.text: My drawing board arrived today. I'm happy and so is my little one. It erases perfectly and it's a good quality. Will be checking out this seller again for future purchases. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Annette Matadi

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My toddler has a lot of fun with this. The stamps are sort of fun, but not really necessary...and they're easy to lose. Quality of construction doesn't seem great, but hasn't fallen apart yet. One thing not clear from the description is that there's a different color in each quadrant.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves drawing on it! It’s easy to use with him.i do wish the sting was a little longer on the pen but other than that it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KelcieS

customer_reviews.title: Great for car rides!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my children to use in the car. They love them! My only disappointment was that the “stampers” fall out easily and can get lost in the car.
customer_reviews.author: L. Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Not really for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My toddler broke it within 3 hours of arrival. However, she has not broken the one from Dollar Trees! Wish I had gone there first. The free bag was a nice touch. I don't recommend this item for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the things I bought my two year old for Christmas this is by far her favorite. Could’ve saved hundreds & she would’ve been just as happy with just this. Awesome, clean fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t given it to my child yet but upon opening it, it feels flimsy and cheaply made. I had a similar one from local store a few years ago that my kids loved and was much better quality for only a few dollars more. Disappointed. We will use because we don’t have time to get another before our trip but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for airplane
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old really liked this as a distraction on our recent trip. It was lightweight, easy to pack, and fun for hours. My only complaints are that the string broke pretty quickly and the magnets are easy to lose. Otherwise, it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Book fiend Kel

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality board. The pencil comes off maybe a bit too easily since children pulled them off the two we purchased. But the board still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic drawing board is very flimsy and not made out of any quality products at all. I would not recommend buying this one if you would like it to last and expect it to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: ryan laninfa

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for my toddler. We leave it in the car so he can have it when we go places, its perfect to store in the bag that comes with it. The only downside is that the three little magnets are not attached like the pen is, so they are easily lost.
customer_reviews.author: Lane R.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My not quite 2 year old can work it. She's even stood on it several times. It's only been a few months, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Goks1211

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. Very cheap and not worth the money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drawing board for my 18-month-old. He loves playing with it and can sit for 10-15 minutes in a place. It's so lightweight and fits in a diaper bag or tote bag. It makes it easier to travel.
customer_reviews.author: kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: much smaller than expected and the colors aren't as bright as the advertised photos. Ok for 2 or 3 year olds
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Great for quiet time
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my two year old who wants to draw all day long. She draws and wants me to guess what it is. I love that it comes with the bag for carrying which makes it super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Sconiers

customer_reviews.title: Smaller but does the job
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. I thought it would be a bit bigger but she loves it. Great to keep her attention for short trips......
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great for long trips!
customer_reviews.text: This entertained my toddler in the car for about an hour of our 7 hour car ride and it’s played with daily since then. It’s easy for them to figure out how to erase. The yellow has started bleeding through a bit, but not enough for it to stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Had one growing up and have an 18 hour drive soon so perfect for the kiddo to Carry in the bag it comes with or hold in his lap in the car etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Cain

customer_reviews.title: Has made coloring so much easier
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this. It's the perfect introduction to coloring for kids who aren't ready to stop trying to eat crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this toy for a good 20 minutes which is a lot for a 15 month old. She really liked it and it’s a good size. I thought it would be smaller, but it’s a perfect size for her. I would recommend for a busy toddler.
customer_reviews.author: daidre luna

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome the only thing is the little pieces it comes with can easily get lost with a little one but definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea
